user.title: Delta Dore Tydom Configuration
user.description: Choose the configuration mode. Cloud mode automatically retrieves Tydom credentials from your Delta Dore account. Manual mode requires you to enter the Tydom password directly.

user_manual.title: Delta Dore Tydom Configuration
user_manual.description: Configure your Tydom gateway using manual credentials. If you need help, visit: https://github.com/CyrilP/hass-deltadore-tydom-component

data.zones_away: Active zones in away alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.zones_home: Active zones in home alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.zones_night: Active zones in night alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.pin: Alarm PIN (optional, required for alarm control)

user_cloud.title: Delta Dore Tydom Configuration
user_cloud.description: Configure your Tydom gateway using your Delta Dore cloud account. The Tydom password will be retrieved automatically. If you need help, visit: https://github.com/CyrilP/hass-deltadore-tydom-component

data.host: Tydom or mediation IP/hostname (use 'mediation.tydom.com' for cloud mode)
data.zones_away: Active zones in away alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.zones_home: Active zones in home alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.zones_night: Active zones in night alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.pin: Alarm PIN (optional, required for alarm control)

discovery_confirm.title: Delta Dore Tydom Configuration
discovery_confirm.description: A Tydom gateway was discovered ({name}). Choose the configuration mode.

discovery_confirm_manual.title: Delta Dore Tydom Configuration
discovery_confirm_manual.description: A Tydom gateway was discovered ({name}). Configure it using manual credentials. If you need help, visit: https://github.com/CyrilP/hass-deltadore-tydom-component

data.zones_away: Active zones in away alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.zones_home: Active zones in home alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.zones_night: Active zones in night alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.pin: Alarm PIN (optional, required for alarm control)

discovery_confirm_cloud.title: Delta Dore Tydom Configuration
discovery_confirm_cloud.description: A Tydom gateway was discovered ({name}). Configure it using your Delta Dore cloud account. The Tydom password will be retrieved automatically. If you need help, visit: https://github.com/CyrilP/hass-deltadore-tydom-component

data.host: Tydom or mediation IP/hostname (use 'mediation.tydom.com' for cloud mode)
data.zones_away: Active zones in away alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.zones_home: Active zones in home alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.zones_night: Active zones in night alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.pin: Alarm PIN (optional, required for alarm control)

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Delta Dore Tydom
reauth_confirm.description: The credentials for {name} have expired or are invalid. Please update them.

error.invalid_zone_config: Zone configuration is invalid. syntax is : zone_id_1,zone_id_2... Example: 1,2,4

abort.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the device

init.title: Delta Dore Tydom Configuration
init.description: Update your Tydom integration settings. If you need help, visit: https://github.com/CyrilP/hass-deltadore-tydom-component

data.zones_away: Active zones in away alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.zones_home: Active zones in home alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)
data.zones_night: Active zones in night alarm mode (comma-separated, e.g., 1,2,4)

error.invalid_zone_config: Zone configuration is invalid. syntax is : zone_id_1,zone_id_2... Example: 1,2,4

options.tydom_cloud_account: Retrieve Tydom credentials using Delta Dore cloud account
